citation: Proclamation under the Taxi and Luxury Hire Car Industries Amendment Act 2011 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Taxi and Luxury Hire Car Industries Amendment Act 2011

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2(2) of the Taxi and Luxury Hire Car Industries Amendment Act 2011 fix 1 July 2013 as the day on which the provisions of that Act, except sections 1 and 2 , commence.

17 June 2013

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

NICK MCKIM

Minister for Sustainable Transport

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 26 June 2013

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Infrastructure, Energy and Resources.
